content: जीव {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [जीव्-कर्तरि क] Living, existing. --वः {@--1@} The principle of life, the vital breath, life, soul; गतजीव, जीवत्याग, जीवाशा, &c. {@--2@} The individual or personal soul enshrined in the human body and imparting to it life, motion and sensation (called जीवात्मन् as opposed to परमात्मन् the Supreme soul); <ls>Y. 3. 131</ls>; <ls>Ms. 12. 22-23</ls>. {@--3@} Life, existence. {@--4@} A creature, living being. {@--5@} Livelihood, profession. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of Karṇa. {@--7@} <ab>N.</ab> of one of the Maruts. {@--8@} The constellation पुष्य. {@--9@} <ab>N.</ab> of Bṛhaspati. {@--10@} The third lustrum in the cycle of Jupiter. {@--11@} Association of cause and effect. {@--12@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu.
